title: Did Billy Graham's daughter say that September 11 was "the punishment of God " for people's movement, evolution, and secularism?
subtitle: During a 2016 radio interview, Anne Graham Lutz said "God allows bad things to happen" like the September 11 attacks to show us that we need it.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The daughter of Billy Graham, Anne Graham Lutz, said that 9/11 was the "punishment of God" of transformers, evolution, and secularism.
